author: davidlt
body:
The patch resolves two bugs detected by ASAN and reported here:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/21296

The problem comes from `CLHEP::HepSymMatrix`, which is using (1, 1) for
starting position instead of (0, 0) according to documentation.

See:
https://gitlab.cern.ch/CLHEP/CLHEP/blob/master/Matrix/Matrix/SymMatrix.h#L120

Please, verify that everything is correct.

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov <David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch>
title: Fix two bugs (out-of-bounds access) in MuonAlignment*
